title: bhArati pATTenum
sahitya:
bhArati pATTenum paintamizh tEnai uNDu bhAratam pudumai sheivOm nAm


anupallavi

  pArinil shUzh kuDiyin makkaLellAm samamAi vAzhndinbam eidiDa vazhi shollum subrahmaNya


caraNam    tani oruvanukkE uNavillai enrAl jagattinai azhippOn ena muzhangiyavan
aravarum kavigaLAl Anaiyai mUTTiyOr arumai tamizh nATTin perumaiyai pEsinOm
